text: Egyptian General Petroleum Corporation is one of the largest oil companies in Egypt and contains thousands of Mercedes to transport fuel for each Benzema on all needs Date of establishment 1911 year. == Known laws and decisions == * Article No. 332 of 1956 for the General Petroleum Corporation is dedicated to the Ministry. * Article No. 135 of 1956: The supporter of the General Organization for Petroleum Employees is a legal supplement. == References == Category:20th-century establishments in Egypt Category:Energy companies
title: Egyptian General Petroleum Corporation
